entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning. Blowing snow at times this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
